Author: Infi
Name: Death Roll Helper
Description:
Plugin to help with any of your /random|/dice games 

    + Support for multiple sorting types (min, max, nearest to) 
    + Highlight numbers based on regex matching 
    + Block players from partaking in any of your games 
    + Accept only /random or /dice 
    + Easily remove players from the result table 

 And alot of more planned feature in future updates
Punchline: Easy to use deathroll/roll game helper with functions to hightlight or block players
